title: Should I get a degree in philosophy? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Arts Degrees in Philosophy

response.answer_text: When students ask this, I always ask a few more questions. Maddening isn't it? Welcome to the degree: what is your financial situation after college?what do you expect your future income to be/what would you be comfortable with?Do you plan on graduate school of any kind (including law or medical school)?
